## Problem 1.1

```{r Problem 1.1}
problem1 <- read_excel("Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
                       sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
                       range = "A2:N408",
                       ) %>%
janitor::clean_names() %>% 
drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls, 0))
       
```

## Problem 1.2

```{r Problem 1.2}
prec18 <- read_excel("Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
                       sheet = "2018 Precipitation",
                       range = "A2:B14") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(month = as.numeric(month)) %>% 
   mutate(year = ifelse(total > 0, "2018", NA))

prec19 <- read_excel("Trash-Wheel-Collection-Totals-8-6-19.xlsx",
                       sheet = "2019 Precipitation",
                       range = "A2:B14") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  mutate(month = as.numeric(month)) %>%
  mutate(year = ifelse(total > 0, "2019", NA))

prob1.2 = 
  bind_rows(prec18, prec19) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%

problem1.2 <- full_join(prec18, prec19, by = "month") 


merge.data.frame()


```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
plot(pressure)
```
